page.title: 09TWO COUNCIL ESTATES
page.content: There are two council estates in Cotmanhay.{Cotmanhay Farm Estate}was built in 1952;{Hopewell Farm Estate} was built in 1972. Louise has lived on both of them. I live on{Cotmanhay Farm Estate.}The shops are very near. My house has got five rooms which are quite large. We have got three bedrooms, a kitchen and a living room. All the houses are the same around the estate. On the map the estate looks as if it is shaped like a bell. The{Hopewell Farm}houses have smaller rooms and smaller gardens. The house I lived in had only got two bedrooms. From the outside the houses look like boxes. There were no shops around us but a mobile shop came round selling sweets, bread, sugar and other basics.
